stdout:
Table	Create Table
sample_exams	CREATE TABLE `sample_exams` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `languageId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `qcerLevelId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `skill` enum('listening','reading','writing','speaking') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `audioUrl` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `pdfUrl` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `isActive` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1',
  `displayOrder` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
